Question: The resulting quarrel came to a head in May: this person attempted to resign and was refused.
Hints: This person always had a gift for absorbing and adapting valuable features of others' music.
This modest income became important to this person when hard times arrived.
Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky wrote his Orchestral Suite No. 4 in G, "this personiana" (1887), as a tribute to this person.
